pages.text: I have spent a lot of time mastering my weapons. Defense is sometimes the greatest offense, and sometimes your defense can even be your offense.

pages.title: Parrying
pages.text: Mobs getting too close? Want to push an attacker off a cliff? If so, parrying is for you. $(br2)To perform this technique, you will first need to crouch, and upon approach of the attacker hold your shield up. $(br2)This will knock your attacker back and stun them.

pages.title: Offensive Defense
pages.text: Knocking and enemy back and stunning them is great, but sometimes you want to give them a good hit. $(br2)You're in luck: After much study, I have found the $(thing)barbed enchantment$() which will deal damage to an enemy upon a successful parry.

pages.title: A Light Shove
pages.text: Enemies getting too close for comfort? Send them flying with the $(thing)pummeling enchanment$(). $(br2)$(o)also works on annoying friends$()
